title: Super laggy on Mac.
body: The old client ran super smooth, however, on this client, every time i go to do something (e.g buy champs, queue up, msg friends etc.) The rainbow wheel always pops up for a second and the client freezes for 2ish seconds. This also happens in ranked everytime a champ is picked or banned. Gets kind of annoying after a while ;( FeelsMacMan.
